title: Top Gainers and Losers today on 11 October, 2024: Trent, Hindalco Industries, Mahindra & Mahindra, Tata Consultancy Services among most active stocks; Check full list here
description: Top Gainers and Losers Today : The Sensex lost 230.05 points, or -0.28, to settle at 81611.41, while the Nifty lost 34.2 points, or -0.14, to close at 24998.45.
content: Top Gainers and Losers Today : **Top Gainers and Losers Today**The Nifty index closed at 24,998.45, representing a decline of 0.14%. Throughout the trading session, the Nifty reached a high of 25,028.65 and a low of 24,920.05. The Sensex fluctuated within the range of 81,671.38 and 81,304.15, ultimately closing down by 0.28% at 81,611.41, which is 230.05 points below its opening price.In terms of performance, the Midcap index outperformed the Nifty 50, with the Nifty Midcap 50 closing 0.23% higher. Additionally, small-cap stocks also surpassed the Nifty 50, as the Nifty Small Cap 100 ended at 18,900.0, marking an increase of 108.8 points or 0.58%.The Nifty 50 has yielded the following returns:- In the last week: -0.21%- In the last month: 0.17%- In the last three months: 2.65%- In the last six months: 10.84%- In the last year: 25.99%The leading gainers in the Nifty index included Trent (up 2.57%), Hindalco Industries (up 2.36%), HCL Technologies (up 1.71%), Tech Mahindra (up 1.69%), and Oil & Natural Gas Corporation (up 1.32%). Conversely, the top losers were Mahindra & Mahindra (down 1.88%), Tata Consultancy Services (down 1.85%), ICICI Bank (down 1.65%), Cipla (down 1.43%), and Maruti Suzuki India (down 1.29%).The Bank Nifty concluded at 51,530.9, having reached an intraday high of 51,560.0 and a low of 51,005.85. The performance of the Bank Nifty is summarized below:- In the last week: -0.59%- In the last month: 0.29%- In the last three months: -2.13%- In the last six months: 5.34%- In the last year: 14.92%Here is the list of stocks that were the **top gainers and losers** during the trading session on October 11, 2024:Top Gainers: HCL Technologies (up 1.63%), Tech Mahindra (up 1.57%), Hindustan Unilever (up 0.96%), Infosys (up 0.83%), Titan Company (up 0.79%).Top Losers: Tata Consultancy Services (down 1.84%), Mahindra & Mahindra (down 1.83%), ICICI Bank (down 1.64%), Maruti Suzuki India (down 1.30%), Power Grid Corporation of India (down 1.30%).Top Gainers: Trent (up 2.57%), Hindalco Industries (up 2.36%), HCL Technologies (up 1.71%), Tech Mahindra (up 1.69%), Oil & Natural Gas Turbines (up 6.16%).Top Losers: Cummins India (down 4.49%), Creditaccess Grameen (down 3.39%), Saregama India (down 3.28%), Jubilant Pharmova (down 3.18%), JSW Energy (down 3.03%).Top Gainers: Nippon Life (up 9.19%), Triveni Turbines (up 6.88%), Network 18 Media & Investments (up 6.69%), BSE (up 6.65%), Sonata Software (up 6.16%).Top Losers: Cummins India (down 4.45%), Creditaccess Grameen (down 3.93%), Star Health and Allied Insurance (down 3.29%), JSW Energy (down 3.04%), Jubilant Pharmova (down 2.64%).
